attributes.action: Rebuild the Crystal Palace to hold exhibitions celebrating British culture.
attributes.additional_details: Britain lacks a unifying symbol of innovation and excellence. The original Crystal Palace captured an age of ambition. Its return would not only revitalise South London but signal to future generations that British culture remains something to behold, not outsource or dilute. Let’s rebuild the mythos.
attributes.background: Commission the architectural resurrection of the Crystal Palace as a national exhibition hall- a sovereign space dedicated to British art, invention, and identity; symbolising post-Brexit cultural consolidation and long-overdue pride in British ingenuity.
